column4: the adobe flash player plugin  is freezing in chromium. the plugin want to access my cam and mic but i'm not able to allow. it's not responding
Are you running 12.10? A couple of other people mentioned an issue with flash in 12.10 last night.

Well, this might not fix your issue, but others are having problems with flash due to compositing. Disabling it seems to resolve the issue: http://www.mail-archive.com/ubuntu-bugs@lists.ubuntu.com/msg3868614.html.
